summary: Completed comprehensive L3 Lifecycle Management testing. All backend L3 APIs are fully functional (40/40 tests passed). Frontend admin interface is protected by authentication which prevented UI testing, but all L3 backend features are working correctly.

integration_issues.issue: Admin interface at /admin requires authentication to access Lifecycle Management UI
integration_issues.note: This is expected security behavior, not a bug

passed_tests: L2 Lifecycle Actions: force-warmup, force-apply, revoke, reset-simulation
L3.1 Constitution Apply - Apply constitution with hash changes
L3.2 Drift Update - Update drift severity with auto-revoke logic
L3.3 Drift Recovery - Drift recovery workflow testing
L3.4 Integrity Check - State integrity validation and fixes
L3.5 Samples Increment - Live samples tracking with auto-promotion
L3.5 Auto-Promotion Check - Promotion eligibility validation
L3 Workflow Scenarios: Constitution binding, drift auto-revoke, drift recovery, auto-promotion, integrity validation
action_item_for_main_agent: All L3 lifecycle features are working correctly from API perspective. Admin UI authentication prevents frontend testing - consider providing test credentials or implementing a test mode to validate UI components. The backend implementation is complete and fully functional.

success_percentage.frontend: Blocked by authentication - UI structure exists but cannot test without credentials

should_main_agent_test_itself: true - only if frontend authentication can be resolved for UI testing
